title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 12.0 - Applicability of part 12 complaint procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 12.0 - Applicability of part 12 complaint procedures

State Regulations

When used in this Part, the term utility includes any such
gas corporation, electric corporation, gas and electric corporation, steam
corporation, municipality, or any entity that, in any manner, sells or
facilitates the sale, furnishing or provision of gas or electric commodity to
residential customers, including energy services companies and owners of
submetered residential buildings; provided, however, that the term does not
include any municipality that is exempt from commission regulation by virtue of
section
1005
(5)(g)
of the Public Authorities

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
12.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
